rdt.model

Class BatchEnsemble

  • java.lang.Object
    • rdt.model.Ensemble
      • rdt.model.BatchEnsemble
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model

    public class BatchEnsemble
extends Ensemble
    Class to represent an ensemble of random decision trees. The trees have been built with the BatchTreeBuilder (batch learning).
    Author:
    MK

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BatchEnsemble(CollectorPreferences cp, int numTrees, int maxDeep, int maxS, long randomSeed)
      Creates a new BatchEnsemble with the given number of trees, maximal depth, the information about the learning tasks, the minimum number of instances to create an inner node and a random seed to initialize the random number generator.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class rdt.model.Ensemble

        build, getCollectorPreferences, getTrees, predict

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • BatchEnsemble

        public BatchEnsemble(CollectorPreferences cp,
                     int numTrees,
                     int maxDeep,
                     int maxS,
                     long randomSeed)
              throws RDTException
        Creates a new BatchEnsemble with the given number of trees, maximal depth, the information about the learning tasks, the minimum number of instances to create an inner node and a random seed to initialize the random number generator.
        Parameters:
        cp - the information about the learning tasks
        numTrees - the number of trees in the ensemble
        maxDeep - the maximum depth of the trees
        maxS - the minimum number of instances to create a inner-node
        randomSeed - a seed to initialize the random number generator
        Throws:
        RDTException
